title: did Wilmington have a earthquake today 2/28/2012 @ 10:12 am ? or was there and explosion ? Our house rocked for about 8 seconds , we live @ 1503 Rankin Street.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://yellowtape.blogs.starnewsonline.com/17934/seneca-guns-to-blame-for-tuesday-morning-noises/
